name: Sugar Corp
description:
You travel to an island surrounded by the Caribbean Sea after hearing about the highly cultivable land and crops they have. You travel there in hopes of establishing your own business of sugar production and make a significant profit in trading overseas. The indigenous people of the land, the Caribs, are masters of growing their crops along the coastlines. You establish your first plantation and hire your first worker to produce sugar cane under the hot sunny weather and ship them off and await your pay. The success of one plantation means the beginning of another. Expand your business as you purchase more plots. Unlock new crops and produce for more profit.

How To Play

Start at the main screen then with your starting silver coin you purchase your first plantation and hire a worker. Click to send the worker to the plantation and start producing sugar cane, once they’re done click again to have them send the produce to the warehouse, another click is required to send the produce to the Northern section of the port and onto the ship before sailing off. Buy all the plots and put down plantations.
